sentences.sContent: He had been chosen by a secret government cabal .
sentences.sContent_eng: He had been chosen by a secret government cabal .
sentences.sCn: 他已被一个秘密的政府阴谋集团选中。

synos.tran: 阴谋（尤指政治上的）；阴谋集团

remMethod.val: 阴谋集团 (cabal) 通过电报 (cable) 通报讯息

trans.tranOther: a small group of people who make secret plans, especially in order to have political power
